name: The Haunted Caverns
description:
The Haunted Caverns is a rougelike platfromer about a wizard trapped inside a Haunted Cave filled with deadly monster. How far will you make it?

This was my first game, created in the Unity engine as part of a university project. All assets apart from sound were created by me.

Feedback and comments appreciated, hope you enjoy!

NOTE: There are a few known bugs; random generation breaks occasionally and shop energy price is uncapped.
